summary.Title: Social Media and Influencer Specialist
summary.Presentation:
We’re searching for a motivated & talented Social Media and Influencer Specialist to join our dedicated Marketing team and be a part of our exciting journey.

Les Deux is built on three

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We’re searching for a motivated & talented Social Media and Influencer Specialist to join our dedicated Marketing team and be a part of our exciting journey.

Les Deux is built on three pillars: Entrepreneurship, Community, and Legacy.

We stay hungry: many dream of success, only a few go and make it happen.
We stay together: we’ve only got to where we are because of our people.
We stay humble: we give back through charitable projects.

Our ambitions are big, and with our talented and passionate team, we know we can make them a reality.

Join us.

The Role

This role is about strengthening our brand presence, engaging our audience, and driving growth by developing and executing impactful social media strategies and managing influencer partnerships. You’ll craft compelling content, build genuine relationships, and expand our brand's reach and influence in the digital landscape.

You'll be collaborating closely with a diverse group of talented individuals both within and beyond our marketing department. Together with our creatives and project coordinators, you’ll ensure that our brand message is consistent and resonates with our audience across all digital marketing channels such as Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, and TikTok.

What You’ll Be Doing

  • Hold the responsibility for our Content Management, selecting content that resonates with our target audience and aligns with our identity.
  • Scheduling all our social media posts using management tools like Buffer and monitoring post-performance to provide insights for optimization.
  • Occasionally contributing to creating visuals, graphics, or short videos to support campaigns, promotions, or trending topics.
  • Planning and executing digital social media campaigns and sponsored posts.
  • Tracking and reporting social media performance using analytics tools.
  • Managing influencer relationships by identifying and evaluating potential influencers for partnerships.
  • Executing the coordination of influencer campaigns and maintaining positive relationships with influencers using tools like Meltwater.
  • Engaging with our social media communities by responding to comments, messages, and mentions on the channels we use.

What You Offer:

You’re a self-starter who takes full ownership of your tasks, thriving in a fast-paced work environment. A social animal who loves to interact and build connections with our online community. With solid experience and a keen understanding of the ever-evolving social media landscape, you stay ahead of trends. You don’t just follow trends—you understand them and use them to keep our brand at the forefront.

Your structured and strategic approach ensures seamless planning and execution of social media postings. With an eye for detail and creativity, you can create engaging content directly from your iPhone, turning ideas into impactful visuals and messages that resonate with the audience.

We are also looking for someone who has:

  • 3 years of proven experience on a professional level in social media management.
  • In-depth knowledge of major social media platforms (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, TikTok)
  • Skills in content creation on a mobile phone “on the go”, and basic video editing.
  • Experience in working with paid content and the distribution of a budget to maximize outcomes.
  • Strong understanding of social media trends and analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Facebook Insights, Buffer, Meltwater, etc.) to measure and track campaign performance.
  • Ability to think creatively, generate innovative ideas, and adapt to a rapidly changing social media landscape.
  • Strong organizational and project management skills, with the ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously and meet deadlines.
  • A great team player who is ambitious and stays humble, just like us.

If there are a couple of things from this list that you feel you’re missing, please do apply anyway. A passion for learning and a great personality is just as important to us as experience

What we offer

Our culture is one of the key reasons that we’ve grown from two people with a side project to an international brand with a team of 100, so retaining a friendly, vibrant, and down-to-earth atmosphere is crucial to us for the future.

We also offer

  • Salary matching your experience and competencies
  • Professional development opportunities to help you improve your skillset.
  • Six weeks of vacation each year
  • Company lunch scheme 
  • Optional pension scheme and Health Insurance
  • Gym & basketball court at the office
  • Free workout sessions on Thursdays with a personal trainer
  • Friday bars and regular company socials
  • Great prices on our clothes and accessories
  • Free fruit, snacks, and most importantly, coffee (our coffee guy recently called our machine “The Ferrari of coffee machines”) 

How to apply

If the above sounds like you then we want to hear from you!

We believe that difference makes us stronger, and encourage everyone to apply regardless of age, ethnicity, ability, gender, gender expression, gender identity, nationality, race, religion, or sexual orientation.

We’ll be reviewing applications on an ongoing basis. Snoozing = losing. Looking forward to hearing from you!
